channel.title: PI hitmark help REP++
channel.description: with poison it displays the sprite "Hits 2" (which is the critical hit sprite) but when it is doing poison i want it to do "Hits 7", how could i make it so when it's poison it displays 7 not 2? if you need pictures or parts of code posted please tell me
